title: Prince of Wales to watch Warren Gatland's team train ahead of World Cup semi-final with South Africa
text:
Dan Biggar will no doubt be hailed the new prince of Wales come Saturday week, if he can steer his country to World Cup triumph in Japan. In the meantime, Wales will have to make do with the current one.

HRH The Prince of Wales will be casting an eye over Warren Gatland’s men at training in Tokyo on Wednesday morning as they build up to their World Cup semi-final clash with South Africa in Yokohama on Sunday.

Prince Charles is in town for the enthronement of Japan's new Emperor Naruhito, who formally proclaimed his ascension in an elaborate ceremony on Tuesday.

Hundreds of heads of state and VIPs descended on Japan’s capital for the festivities, which saw the new emperor sit inside the 6.5m-high...
description: Dan Biggar will no doubt be hailed the new prince of Wales come Saturday week, if he can steer his country to World Cup triumph in Japan.
